reuters.title: GRANDVIEW ACQUIRES CONTROL OF U.K. TICKET GROUP
reuters.body:
Consolidated Grandview Inc said it acquired a 60 pct stake in <All Ticket Group PLC>, of London, for undisclosed terms. The seller was also undisclosed. All Ticket is a special events travel company with exclusive European rights to UAL Inc <UAL>'s United Airlines Apollo system, booking all United Airlines flights in Britain and Europe. All Ticket and its subsidiaries will also co-sponsor various events this year including the British Open golf tournament and rowing's Henley Regatta. Its 1986 revenues totaled 12 mln Canadian dlrs.
Reuter 
